content_container.title: Custom Magnets
content_container.subtitle: Creative, Functional, and Magnetic — Perfect for Every Space
descriptions: Turn your artwork, brand, or message into something that sticks with our Custom Magnets. Whether you’re promoting your business, decorating your space, or creating unique gifts, these high-quality magnets are designed to make a lasting impression — literally and visually.
Our Custom Magnets are printed in vivid full colour and crafted using durable magnetic materials that firmly attach to any metal surface — from refrigerators and lockers to office whiteboards.
Choose from a variety of shapes, sizes, and finishes to match your creative needs. Each magnet is produced with precision printing for sharp detail and long-lasting colour vibrancy.
perfect_for: Corporate Branding - Logo magnets for offices, events, or client giveaways.
Home Décor - Family photos, art prints, or travel memories on the fridge.
Event Souvenirs - Wedding, party, or event keepsakes your guests will love.
Retail Merchandise - Sell your designs as collectible magnets or souvenirs.
Car Magnets - Promote your business or cause on the go.
Photography Gifts - Custom photo magnets for gifts or online shops.
Promotional Giveaways - Affordable yet memorable marketing items.

faq.question: Can I customize the design?
faq.answer: Yes! You can print your logo, artwork, or any design of your choice to create unique magnetic stickers for personal or business use.

faq.question: Where can I use magnetic stickers?
faq.answer: They work perfectly on fridges, lockers, whiteboards, cars, filing cabinets, or any smooth metal surface.

faq.question: Are they reusable?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can remove and reposition them as many times as you like without leaving residue or marks.

faq.question: What sizes and shapes are available?
faq.answer: We offer a variety of standard sizes and shapes, and we can also produce custom shapes to match your design.

faq.question: Will they damage surfaces?
faq.answer: No. Magnetic stickers are non-adhesive, so they won’t leave any sticky residue or cause scratches when used properly.

shapes_sizes.title: Shapes & Sizes
shapes_sizes.description: Choose from a wide variety of shapes and sizes to perfectly match your design needs. Whether you’re looking for classic circles, bold squares, or custom die-cut options, we offer flexible dimensions to bring your ideas to life.
